laboratory_examinations.findings: Peripheral WBC count of 4400 cells/mm3, with an absolute lymphocyte count of 300 cells/mm3.
71 nucleated cells with 80% neutrophils and 14% lymphocytes; protein level 66 g/dL, glucose level 96 g/dL; negative Gram stain and cultures.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: A second analysis on 28 June revealed 18 nucleated cells, with 85% lymphocytes; protein level, 77 g/dL; glucose level, 86 g/dL. PCR and viral cultures were negative.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Positive for enterovirus from a blood sample obtained on 14 June.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Negative results for additional viral blood cultures obtained on 19 June and 28 June.
